questions.question: How do I add the bot to my server?
questions.answer: Click the 'Add to Discord' button on our homepage and follow the simple authorization process. You'll need administrator permissions on your server.

questions.question: What permissions does the bot need?
questions.answer: The bot requires basic permissions like sending messages, managing roles, and voice channel access. You can review all permissions during the setup process.

questions.question: Is the bot free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a generous free tier with essential features. Premium features are available through our paid plans.

questions.question: What commands are available?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of commands for moderation, music, fun, and utility. Use /help to see all available commands.

questions.question: Can I customize command prefixes?
questions.answer: Yes! Premium users can set custom prefixes for their servers. Free users can use the default / prefix.

questions.question: How does the music player work?
questions.answer: Our music player supports YouTube, Spotify, and SoundCloud. Just use /play followed by a song name or URL.

questions.question: The bot is not responding to commands
questions.answer: First, check if the bot is online and has proper permissions. Try reinviting the bot if issues persist.

questions.question: How do I report a bug?
questions.answer: Join our support server to report bugs or use the /report command. Our team will investigate and respond promptly.

questions.question: How do I upgrade to Premium?
questions.answer: Visit our premium page and choose a plan. We accept major credit cards and PayPal.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your premium subscription at any time. Your benefits will continue until the end of your billing period.
